children.description: The contents of the Breadcrumbs. Usually a list of BreadcrumbItem components.
children.description_zh: The contents of the Breadcrumbs. Usually a list of BreadcrumbItem components.

color.type: foreground | primary | secondary | success | warning | danger

separator.description: The custom separator between Breadcrumbs. It is a chevron by default.
separator.description_zh: The custom separator between Breadcrumbs. It is a chevron by default.

:maxItems.description: The maximum number of breadcrumbs to display.
:maxItems.description_zh: The maximum number of breadcrumbs to display.

:itemsBeforeCollapse.description: The number of items to show before the ellipsis.
:itemsBeforeCollapse.description_zh: The number of items to show before the ellipsis.

:itemsAfterCollapse.description: The number of items to show after the ellipsis.
:itemsAfterCollapse.description_zh: The number of items to show after the ellipsis.

hideSeparator.description: Whether to hide the separator between breadcrumbs.
hideSeparator.description_zh: Whether to hide the separator between breadcrumbs.

isDisabled.description: Whether the Breadcrumbs are disabled except the last item.
isDisabled.description_zh: Whether the Breadcrumbs are disabled except the last item.

disableAnimation.description: Whether the Breadcrumbs should display animations.
disableAnimation.description_zh: Whether the Breadcrumbs should display animations.

itemClasses.description: Allows to set custom class names for the breadcrumbs item slots.
itemClasses.description_zh: Allows to set custom class names for the breadcrumbs item slots.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the breadcrumbs slots.
classNames.description_zh: Allows to set custom class names for the breadcrumbs slots.

methods.name: renderEllipsis
methods.description: Handler called when the press is released over the target.
methods.description_zh: Handler called when the press is released over the target.

events.name: onAction
events.description: Handler called when any breadcrumb item is pressed. It returns the item key.
events.description_zh: Handler called when any breadcrumb item is pressed. It returns the item key.
